about_the_game:
Bike Stunt 3D Freestyle - Unleash Your Inner Daredevil!

Get ready to ignite your adrenaline with Bike Stunt 3D Freestyle! This thrilling side-scrolling stunt game challenges you to push the limits of gravity and skill as you master a variety of epic tricks and stunts.

Features:

Daring Stunt Challenges: Test your biking prowess across a series of increasingly complex courses. From daring flips to gravity-defying tricks, every stunt counts toward your high score!

Dynamic Environments: Experience vibrant, detailed graphics as you navigate through diverse and challenging environments. Each level offers a new backdrop to showcase your stunt skills.

Customizable Characters: Personalize your rider with a wide array of customization options. Choose unique outfits and gear to make your character stand out in every performance.

Four Distinct Bikes: Select from four unique bikes, each with its own characteristics and performance traits. Choose the one that fits your style and enhance your gameplay experience.

Intuitive Controls: Whether you’re a seasoned rider or a newcomer, the game’s controls are designed for ease of use and depth. Perfect your timing and execution to land those impressive tricks.

Progressive Unlocks: As you conquer levels and earn high scores, unlock new customization options and enhance your riding experience. Compete for top spots on the leaderboards and showcase your skills to the world.

Dive into the world of Bike Stunt 3D Freestyle and unleash your inner stunt rider. Download now and start your journey to become the ultimate bike stunt champion!

Ready to take on the challenge? Gear up and ride to fame with Bike Stunt 3D Freestyle!

name: Bike Stunt 3D Freestyle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD graphics
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 610
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Carefully move motorcycle for off-road driving tracks in this Bike Stunt 3D Freestyle game is completely different from other bike games so you can easily perform unlimited off-road stunts.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Traditional Chinese
